taDuoc: citric acid khan, natri hydrogen carbonat, natri carbonat khan, mannitol, lactose khan, ascorbic acid, natri citrat, saccharin natri, hương việt quất “B” (có chứa hương wildberry, hương blackbery, vanillin, maltodextrin, mannitol, gluconolacton, sorbitol, magie carbonat, silica colloidal khan)
